main.name: Paul Wang
main.description: Hi! I'm a software developer recently graduated from the University of Calgary. I've been particularly interested in full-stack development lately and this website is where I explore it
main.bio: Throughout my degree I've programmed a lot via C++/Java/Python but I found web development more interesting. This website and my project below are examples of me exploring the world of web-development. I'm currently looking for employment opportunities so feel free to reach out via the contact information below.

work.title: Student Software Developer
work.description: One year co-op - worked as a junior developer on application level C++ software for embedded GPS/communication devices. Experienced CI/CD Jenkins pipelines via automated GoogleTest/Python tests.

work.title: Interactive Web Developer
work.description: Worked with teachers, gathering requirements to develop learning tools/javascript web-apps to aid their respective online Moodle courses.
